title: "Slide Sitemap"
output: html_document
---


```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringi)


make_full = function(myurl,gituser="datascience4psych",myrepo="slides") {
  paste0('https://',gituser,'.github.io/',myrepo,'/',myurl)
# paste0('https://',gituser,'.github.io/',myurl)
}
make_hyperlink = function(myurl,mytext=myurl) {
  paste0('<a href="',myurl,'">',mytext,'</a>')
}

df_docs <- list.files(path="../slides/.", '[.]html$', recursive=TRUE)
#df_docs=list.files( '[.]html$', recursive=TRUE)


df <- data.frame(
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
      #        title = str_replace_all(str_remove(df_docs, "\\.html"),"[_-]"," "),
              title = str_remove(df_docs, "\\.html"),  
              link = make_full(df_docs)
) %>% filter (!title %in% c(
                            "d00_APS/d00_aps",
                            "d00_APS/d00_teaser",
                          "d23_multiple/d23_multiple_files/figure-html/widgets/widget_plotly-plot",
                          "setup",
                          "workshop/archive/h1",
                            "index")) %>%
  filter (!str_detect(title, "alt/")) %>%
  filter (!str_detect(title, "d00_template/")) %>%
  filter (!str_detect(title, "d00_APS/")) %>%
   filter (!str_detect(title, "00_ASU/")) %>%
    filter (!str_detect(title, "backup")) %>%
    filter (!str_detect(title, "figure-html")) %>%
    filter (!str_detect(title, "widgets")) %>%
    filter (!str_detect(title, "archive")) %>%
  mutate(group = case_when(
          str_detect(title, "workshop") ~ "Workshop",
          TRUE ~ "Class"
        ))


df %>%
    mutate(
        link = glue::glue("[slides]({link})"),
        link = map(link, gt::md),
        title = case_when(
          title == "d01.1_AI/d01.1_AI" ~ "d01_zAI/d01_zAI",
          TRUE ~ title
        )) %>%
  arrange(title)  %>% 
  select(group, title, link) %>%
    gt()

```
